attributes.action: Allow those who chose to resit A level and GCSE exams a chance to sit exams.
attributes.background: Those who were held back due to last years CAG’s should have a chance to resit a real exam in 2021 if they wish to do so, as exams had been promised to go through

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give students the option to take exams or receive assessed grades for 2020/21: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559964

Offer GCSE and A level students the option to sit their exams at a later date: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567743
